key_risks: Economic sensitivity due to reliance on Hawaii’s tourism and real estate sectors
Regulatory and compliance challenges increasing operational costs
Leadership instability with recent executive resignations
Competitive pressures from traditional banks and fintech companies
controversies: Scams targeting customers by impersonating the bank
Concerns over cybersecurity governance and data security effectiveness
social_issues: Customer data security concerns due to targeted scams
governance_issues: Leadership instability with CFO resignation (2021) and COO departure (March 2025)

sources.snippet: Your phone rings and you see First Hawaiian Bank in the caller ID so you answer. sources.title: First Hawaiian Bank debit card fraud dispute : r/Hawaii - Reddit
sources.snippet: Does anyone have experience disputing fraudulent debit card transactions with First Hawaiian Bank? I got hit with over $1500 in unauthorized transactions this morning, all to merchants in Georgia. I immediately called to report fraud, cancel the card, and dispute the charges. They said it could take up to 90 DAYS to investigate the dispute.
